PrizeList.Description: The winning team will get a voucher for 200$ to eat at their prefered diner.
The winning team will get to spend a day at Arnaoon Village.
The winning team will get to eat and play bowling at the Link.
The winning team will get to play a game of Escape the Room.
The winning team will get to spend a day driving segways in Beirut.
The winning team will get play paintball or laser tag, the team must have at least 8 members.
The winning team will get a tent to be used only by the team.
The winning team will get to do some kayaking.
The winning team will get 200$ to help pay for Scuba diving lessons.
